article.Heading: Impression that GSTN has been deployed without testing is wrong: GSTN Chairman
article.Summary: In an interview to CNBC-TV18's Ronojoy Banerjee, Navin Kumar Chairman, GSTN spoke about the preparedness of GSTN post its launch on July 1 2017.
article.Body:
In an interview to CNBC-TV18's Ronojoy Banerjee, Navin Kumar Chairman, GSTN spoke about the preparedness of GSTN post its launch on July 1 2017.
